Verses: 1 ivaigalukkuppinbu Yoodharudaiya Pandigai Ondru Vandhadhu; Appozhudhu Yesu Erusalemukkup Ponaar.
2 ebireya Baashaiyile Pedhasthaa Ennappatta Oru Kulam Erusalemil Aattu Vaasalinaruge Irukkiradhu, Adharku Aindhu Mandabangalundu.
3 avaigalile Kurudar, Sappaanigal, Soombina Uruppudaiyavargal Mudhalaana Vyaadhikkaarar Anegar Paduththirundhu, Thanneer Eppozhudhu Kalangum Endru Kaaththukkondiruppaargal.

4 enenil Sila Samayangalil Dhevathoodhan Oruvan Andhak Kulaththil Irangi, Thanneeraik Kalakkuvaan; Thanneer Kalanginapinbu Yaar Mundhi Adhil Iranguvaano Avan Epperppatta Vyaadhisthanaayirundhaalum Sosthamaavaan.
5 muppaththettu Varusham Vyaadhikondirundha Oru Manushan Ange Irundhaan.
6 paduththirundha Avanai Yesu Kandu, Avan Vegukaalamaai Vyaadhisthanendru Arindhu, Avanai Nokki: Sosthamaagavendumendru Virumbugiraayaa Endru Kettaar.
7 adharku Vyaadhisthan Aandavare, Thanneer Kalakkappadumbodhu Ennaik Kulaththil Kondupoi Vidugiradharku Oruvarumillai, Naan Pogiradharkulle Veroruvan Enakku Mundhi Irangividugiraan Endraan.
8 yesu Avanai Nokki: Ezhundhiru, Un Padukkaiyai Eduththukkondu Nada Endraar.
9 udane Andha Manushan Sosthamaagi, Than Padukkaiyai Eduththukkondu, Nadandhuponaan. Andha Naal Oivunaalaayirundhadhu.
10 aadhalaal Yoodhargal Gunamaakkappattavanai Nokki: Idhu Oivunaalaayirukkiradhe, Padukkaiyai Eduththukkondu Pogiradhu Unakku Nyaayamalla Endraargal.
11 avan Avargalukkup Pradhiyuththaramaaga Ennai Sosthamaakkinavar, Un Padukkaiyai Eduththukkondu Nadavendru Enakku Sonnaar Endraan.
12 adharku Avargal: Un Padukkaiyai Eduththukkondu Nadavendru Unnudane Sonna Manushan Yaar Endru Avanidaththil Kettaargal.
13 sosthamaakkappattavan Avar Innaarendru Ariyavillai; Avvidaththil Janangal Koottamaayirundhapadiyinaal Yesu Vilagiyirundhaar.
14 adharkuppinbu Yesu Avanai Dhevaalayaththile Kandu: Idho, Nee Sosthamaanaai, Adhiga Kedaanadhondrum Unakku Varaadhapadi Inip Paavancheyyaadhe Endraar.
15 andha Manushan Poi, Thannai Sosthamaakkinavar Yesu Endru Yoodhargalukku Ariviththaan.
16 yesu Ivaigalai Oivunaalil Seydhapadiyaal, Yoodhargal Avaraith Thunbappaduththi, Avaraik Kolaiseyya Vagaithedinaargal.
17 yesu Avargalai Nokki: En Pidhaa Idhuvaraikkum Kiriyaiseydhuvarugiraar. Naanum Kiriyaiseydhuvarugiren Endraar.

18 avar Oivunaal Kattalaiyai Meerinadhumallaamal, Dhevanaith Thammudaiya Sondhap Pidhaa Endrunchollith Thammai Dhevanukku Samamaakkinapadiyinaale, Yoodhargal Avaraik Kolaiseyyumpadi Adhigamaai Vagaithedinaargal.

19 appozhudhu Yesu Avargalai Nokki: Meyyaagave Meyyaagave Naan Ungalukku Sollugiren Pidhaavaanavar Seyyak Kumaaran Kaangiradhedhuvo, Adhaiyeyandri, Verondraiyum Thaamaai Seyyamaattaar; Avar Evaigalai Seygiraaro, Avaigalaik Kumaaranum Andhappadiye Seygiraar.

20 pidhaavaanavar Kumaaranidaththil Anbaayirundhu, Thaam Seygiravaigalaiyellaam Avarukkuk Kaanbikkiraar; Neengal Aachchariyappadaththakkadhaaga Ivaigalaip Paarkkilum Peridhaana Kiriyaigalaiyum Avarukkuk Kaanbippaar.
21 pidhaavaanavar Mariththorai Ezhuppi Uyirppikkiradhupola, Kumaaranum Thamakku Siththamaanavargalai Uyirppikkiraar.

22 andriyum Pidhaavaik Ganampannugiradhupola Ellaarum Kumaaranaiyum Ganampannumpadikku, Pidhaavaanavardhaame Oruvarukkum Nyaayaththeerppu Seyyaamal, Nyaayaththeerppu Seyyum Adhigaaram Muzhuvadhaiyum Kumaaranukku Oppukkoduththirukkiraar.
23 kumaaranai Ganampannaadhavan Avarai Anuppina Pidhaavaiyum Ganampannaadhavanaayirukkiraan.

24 en Vasanaththaik Kettu, Ennai Anuppinavarai Visuvaasikkiravanukku Niththiyajeevan Undu; Avan Aakkinaiththeerppukkutpadaamal, Maranaththaivittu Neengi, Jeevanukkutpattirukkiraan Endru Meyyaagave Meyyaagave Ungalukku Sollugiren.
25 mariththor Dhevakumaaranudaiya Saththaththaik Ketkunkaalam Varum, Adhu Ippozhudhe Vandhirukkiradhu; Adhaik Ketkiravargal Pizhaippaargal Endru Meyyaagave Meyyaagave Ungalukku Sollugiren.
26 enenil, Pidhaavaanavar Thammil Thaame Jeevanudaiyavaraayirukkiradhupola, Kumaaranum Thammilthaame Jeevanudaiyavaraayirukkumpadi Arul Seydhirukkiraar.
27 avar Manushakumaaranaayirukkirapadiyaal, Nyaayaththeerppu Seyyumpadikku Adhigaaraththaiyum Avarukkuk Koduththirukkiraar.
28 idhaikkuriththu Neengal Aachchariyappadavendaam; Enendraal Predhakkuzhigalilulla Anaivarum Avarudaiya Saththaththaik Ketkun Kaalam Varum;
29 appozhudhu, Nanmaiseydhavargal Jeevanai Adaiyumpadi Ezhundhirukkiravargalaagavum, Theemai Seydhavargal Aakkinaiyai Adaiyumpadi Ezhundhirukkiravargalaagavum Purappaduvaargal.

30 naan En Suyamaai Ondruncheygiradhillai; Naan Ketkirapadiye Nyaayantheerkkiren; Enakku Siththamaanadhai Naan Thedaamal, Ennai Anuppina Pidhaavukku Siththamaanadhaiye Naan Thedugirapadiyaal En Theerppu Needhiyaayirukkiradhu.
31 ennaikkuriththu Naane Saatchikoduththaal En Saatchi Meyyaayiraadhu.
32 ennaikkuriththu Saatchikodukkiravar Veroruvar Irukkiraar, Avar Ennaikkuriththuk Kodukkira Saatchi Meyyaana Saatchiyendru Arindhirukkiren.
33 neengal Yovaanidaththil Aalanuppi Visaariththeergal, Avan Saththiyaththirku Saatchikoduththaan.
34 naan Etrukkollugira Saatchi Manusharudaiya Saatchiyalla, Neengal Ratchikkappaduvadharkaagave Ivaigalai Sollugiren.
35 avan Erindhu Pragaasikkira Vilakkaayirundhaan; Neengalum Silakaalam Avan Velichchaththile Kalikoora Manadhaayirundheergal.

36 yovaanudaiya Saatchiyaippaarkkilum Menmaiyaana Saatchi Enakku Undu; Adhennavenil, Naan Niraivetrumpadikkup Pidhaavaanavar Enakkuk Karpiththadhum Naan Seydhuvarugiradhumaana Kiriyaigale Pidhaa Ennai Anuppinaar Endru Ennaikkuriththu Saatchi Kodukkiradhu.
37 ennai Anuppina Pidhaa Thaame Ennaik Kuriththu Saatchi Koduththirukkiraar; Neengal Orukkaalum Avar Saththaththaik Kettadhumillai, Avar Roobaththaik Kandadhumillai.
38 avar Anuppinavarai Neengal Visuvaasiyaadhapadiyaal Avarudaiya Vasanam Ungalil Thariththirukkiradhumillai.
39 vedhavaakkiyangalai Aaraaindhupaarungal; Avaigalaal Ungalukku Niththiyajeevan Undendru Ennugireergale, Ennaikkuriththu Saatchikodukkiravaigalum Avaigale.
40 appadiyirundhum Ungalukku Jeevan Undaagumpadi Ennidaththil Vara Ungalukku Manadhillai.
41 naan Manusharaal Magimaiyai Etrukkollugiradhillai.
42 ungalil Dheva Anbu Illaiyendru Ungalai Arindhirukkiren.
43 naan En Pidhaavin Naamaththinaale Vandhirundhum Neengal Ennai Etrukkollavillai, Veroruvan Than Suya Naamaththinaale Vandhaal Avanai Etrukkolveergal.
44 dhevanaalemaaththiram Varugira Magimaiyaith Thedaamal, Oruvaraaloruvar Magimaiyai Etrukkollugira Neengal Eppadi Visuvaasippeergal?
45 pidhaavinidaththil Naan Ungalmel Kutranchaattuven Endru Ninaiyaadhirungal, Neengal Nambugira Moseye Ungalmel Kutranchaattuvaan.
46 neengal Moseyai Visuvaasiththeergalaanaal, Ennaiyum Visuvaasippeergal; Avan Ennaikkuriththu Ezhudhiyirukkiraane.
47 avan Ezhudhina Vaakkiyangalai Neengal Visuvaasiyaamalirundhaal Naan Sollugira Vasanangalai Eppadi Visuvaasippeergal Endraar.
